content: Figure 3.  Corporate Bond Bid-Ask Spreads    Note:  We compute the measures using nondefaulted bonds that have traded at least 10 times between 10:30 a.m. and 3:30 p.m.  We exclude 144a bonds.    Source:  BTDS Data provided by FINRA's TRACE System; Thomson Reuters SDC Platinum; Mergent Corporate FISD Daily Feed  (FITF); Moody's Analytics Default and Recovery Database (DRD).
